channel.title: Distributed Energy on John Januszczak | Fintech & Innovation Strategy
channel.description: Recent content in Distributed Energy on John Januszczak | Fintech & Innovation Strategy

item.title: Voltai
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: An AboitizPower-backed venture launching the Philippines’ first large-scale battery-swapping ecosystem dedicated to B2B electric vehicle fleets.

item.title: Solviva
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: An AboitizPower-backed venture removing the high upfront costs of solar adoption through an innovative ‘Rent-to-Own’ financing model for Filipino homeowners and MSMEs.
